results.title: Simvastatin is associated with superior lipid and glycaemic control to atorvastatin and reduced levels of incident Type 2 diabetes, in men and women, in the UK Biobank
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ was also associated with reduced risk of incident @<m>DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@T2DM@@@ in both @SPECIES_9606 @@@men@@@ and @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@ (p < .0001) in the UKBiobank.

citations.NLM: English AR, Prasad B, McGuigan DH, Horigan G, O'Kane M, Bjourson AJ, Shukla P, Kelly C, McClean PL. Simvastatin is associated with superior lipid and glycaemic control to atorvastatin and reduced levels of incident Type 2 diabetes, in men and women, in the UK Biobank Endocrinol Diabetes Metab. 2022 May;5(3):e00326. PMID: 35243827

results.title: Statin versus ezetimibe-statin for incident atrial fibrillation among patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus with acute coronary syndrome and acute ischemic stroke
results.text_hl: We identified @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ coexisting with @<m>DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@T2DM@@@, @DISEASE_Acute_Coronary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D054058 @@@ACS@@@ and @DISEASE_Ischemic_Stroke @DISEASE_MESH:D000083242 @@@AIS@@@ who received @CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069438 @@@ezetimibe@@@-@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ treatment as the case group and the index date was the date of first use of the @CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069438 @@@ezetimibe@@@-@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@.

results.title: Genotoxic and cytotoxic assessment of sitagliptin and simvastatin alone and in combination.
results.text_hl: The findings concluded a non-genotoxic combination of @CHEMICAL_Sitagliptin_Phosphate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068900 @@@sitagliptin@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ which possess a least @DISEASE_Drug_Related_Side_Effects_and_Adverse_Reactions @DISEASE_MESH:D064420 @@@cytotoxic@@@ potential suggesting the safe use of the combination both in @<m>DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@T2DM@@@ and @DISEASE_Coronary_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D003327 @@@CHD@@@.

citations.NLM: Majeed Khan H, Nawaz H, Aerooj H, Sharif A. Genotoxic and cytotoxic assessment of sitagliptin and simvastatin alone and in combination. Pak J Pharm Sci. 2021 Sep;34(5(Supplementary)):1939-1944. PMID: 34836863

results.title: Sub-gingival delivery of simvastatin and rosuvastatin for treatment of chronic periodontitis with diabetes mellitus: A randomized controlled clinical-radiographic pilot study
results.text_hl: 30 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Chronic_Periodontitis @DISEASE_MESH:D055113 @@@CP@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 DM@@@ were classified into three treatment groups - SRP + placebo, SRP +1.2% @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SMV@@@ and SRP +1.2% @CHEMICAL_Rosuvastatin_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068718 @@@RSV@@@.

results.title: Simvastatin profoundly impairs energy metabolism in primary human muscle cells
results.text_hl: ...@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ use is associated with @DISEASE_Muscular_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D009135 @@@muscular@@@ side effects, and increased risk for @<m>DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@T2D@@@).

results.title: Effects of Statin Dose, Class, and Use Intensity on All-Cause Mortality in Patients with Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
results.text_hl: The current study is the first to demonstrate the order of intensity by which specific statin classes affect mortality in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes@@@: @CHEMICAL_pitavastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:C108475 @@@pitavastatin@@@ > @CHEMICAL_Rosuvastatin_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068718 @@@rosuvastatin@@@ > @CHEMICAL_Pravastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017035 @@@pravastatin@@@ > @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ > @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@ > @CHEMICAL_Fluvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077340 @@@fluvastatin@@@ > @CHEMICAL_Lovastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008148 @@@lovastatin@@@.

citations.NLM: Yu JM, Chen WM, Chen M, Shia BC, Wu SY. Effects of Statin Dose, Class, and Use Intensity on All-Cause Mortality in Patients with Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus Pharmaceuticals (Basel). 2023 Mar 29;16(4):. PMID: 37111264

results.title: Effects of SLCO1B1 Genetic Variant on Metabolite Profile in Participants on Simvastatin Treatment
results.text_hl: Logistic regression was used to calculate incident @<m>DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@T2D@@@ among the participants with and without @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ treatment.

results.title: Effects of metformin and simvastatin treatment on ultrastructural features of liver macrophages in HFD mice.
results.text_hl: In contrast with untreated HFD-fed animals, @CHEMICAL_Lipids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008055 @@@lipid@@@ droplets were not observed in lysosomes of macrophages in HFD animals treated with @CHEMICAL_Metformin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@. These findings provide new insight into the effects of @CHEMICAL_Metformin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ on the liver in this experimental model of @<m>DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes@@@ and provide further rationale for implementation of statins in the therapeutic regimens in this disease.

citations.NLM: Ciric D, Kravic-Stevovic T, Bumbasirevic V, Petricevic S, Jovanovic S, Trajkovic V, Martinovic T. Effects of metformin and simvastatin treatment on ultrastructural features of liver macrophages in HFD mice. Ultrastruct Pathol. 2023 Jan 2;47(1):1-11. PMID: 36520527
